solution_line_template: That means the cheezits have {calories_per_chip}/{cheezit_calorie_fraction_denominator} = <<{calories_per_chip}/{cheezit_calorie_fraction_denominator}={additional_calories_per_cheezit}>>{additional_calories_per_cheezit} calories more than each chip
That means they have {num_cheezits} * {calories_per_cheezit} = <<{num_cheezits}*{calories_per_cheezit}={total_cheezit_calories}>>{total_cheezit_calories} total calories
So in total, he ate {total_chip_calories} + {total_cheezit_calories} = <<{total_chip_calories}+{total_cheezit_calories}={total_calories_eaten}>>{total_calories_eaten} calories
